name: Dungeon Defense (itch) (Dyslexci)
description:
I spent an extra 30 mins to update it if you wanna see the real idea of it - https://dyslexci.itch.io/dungeon-defense-updated

press f for fullscreen

WASD to move

shift to dash

q for spikes

e for piston

space to deselect

kill them dudes lmao
